author: gozer
msg: apr_table_(copy|overlay) has hierarchical requirements on the pool
being used, since it copies content from table to table without
The test logic was broken and would produce these kind of aborts
apr_table_copy: t's pool is not an ancestor of p
apr_table_overlay: overlay's pool is not an ancestor of p
apr_table_overlay: base's pool is not an ancestor of p
This reworks the test logic a bit to keep on testing what it was
testing, while passing correct pools to the various table methods
